short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Add custom reminders at the top of any page or site, like "don't forget this is the company's Twitter account."

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Ever have trouble remembering not to tweet personal stuff from the company account? I do that all the time. It's an easy problem to solve. Just click Site Reminder to set up personal reminders for websites and individual pages.
